title: 为什么有时候BBS会卡顿
author: sun1823312876
txt_content: BBS有时候会卡顿，你们有么

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 因为被某临时工版主攻击了

replies.author: fiktfli
replies.txt_content: 你这么说，我貌似没卡过

replies.author: Daim呆毛
replies.txt_content: 正常抽风 404错误 习惯就好

replies.author: 红豆大魔王
replies.txt_content: 卡顿的时候是BBS在跟育碧谈合作[滑稽]
